## Interaction web

This is an R code  <http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com>.

When you click the **Knit** button a document will be generated that includes both content as well as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document. You can embed an R code chunk like this:


```{r setup, include=FALSE}
input <- list.files(path = "C:/input/",
                n = ".csv$", 
                full.names = T)
names <- list.files(path = "C:/input/", 
                  pattern = ".csv$", 
                  full.names = F)
Finalnam <- paste0("C:/metrics_",nam) #Create output folder

for (i in 1:length(input)){
  matrix <- read.csv(D[i])
  matrix <- as.data.frame(matrix)
  matrix <- matrix %>%
    group_by(Tribe) %>%
    summarise(across(everything(), sum, na.rm=TRUE))
  matriz_values <- matrix[,2:length(matrix)]
  final_values = as.matrix(matriz_values)
  rownames(final_values) = matriz$Tribe
  net <-networklevel(final_values)
  write.csv(net, Finalnam[i], row.names = TRUE)
}
```
